Certifications (Preferred): CCNP/CCIE, VCP, RHCE, MCSE, or equivalent. Strong problem-solving, communication, and multitasking abilities. Soft Skills: Strong communication and problem-solving skills. Effective time management and attention to detail. Team-oriented and adaptable to changes. Responsibilities & Context FSN Solution Limited is a cyber security company committed to delivering cutting-edge solutions to protect our clients from evolving cyber threats. As we expand our operations, we are looking for a few experienced and dynamic cyber security engineers to join our talented team of cybersecurity experts. In this role, you will play a critical role in ensuring that the infrastructure of our clients is protected from sophisticated cyber threats. Job Summary: We are looking for a highly skilled Network and Infrastructure Consultant with over 10 years of experience in core networking, virtualization (VMware, Proxmox, and Hyper-V), Linux and Windows Server management, Active Directory, NGFWs, and endpoint security. The role focuses on designing and managing secure, scalable IT environments tailored to business requirements. Responsibilities: Manage virtualization platforms, including VMware, Proxmox, and Hyper-V. Administer Linux and Windows Servers, including Active Directory and GPOs. Design and manage LAN, WAN, and VPN solutions.Configure and monitor NGFWs (e.g., Palo Alto, Fortinet) and IDS/IPS systems. Implement and maintain endpoint security measures. Virtualization and Systems Management: Maintain server hardware, storage solutions, and networking devices. Perform system backups, disaster recovery, and hardware lifecycle management. Develop and maintain system documentation, network diagrams, and SOPs. Ensure compliance with security and industry standards. Student Advisor : Unibuzz Ltd Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Unibuzz Ltd Student Advisor Application Deadline : 12 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 20 to 39 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Tk. 20000 - 40000 (Monthly) Published: 13 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education A Level A Level in Fluent In English Additional Requirements Age 20 to 39 years Note : Working Hours = 04.00 pm to 11.00 pm Weekly = Monday to Friday Responsibilities & Context Main purpose of the job Student Advisor will support setting the student recruitment targets based on acquired knowledge of markets, partnerships, and past trends. The role is crucial in supporting the counselling teams in meeting their recruitment targets. Student Advisor will focus on the development and execution of the Unibuzz student recruitment strategy, targeting appropriate students from key geographies. The role holder will grow awareness, support recruitment and convert students through varied channels, in order to meet annual growth and targets. The role will create and implement a carefully planned programme of conversion activities for prospective students, ensuring they receive a coordinated and timely flow of communication. Duties and Responsibilities · Screening and assessing inbound leads from marketing activity via high-volume phone calls, face-to-face meetings and online webinars. · Meeting and exceeding the company’s KPIs and intake targets by supporting counselling teams. · Ensuring each stage of the student lifecycle is completed whilst meeting customer needs by regular follow ups and thorough analysis of the company CRM. · Breaking down barriers to entry and utilising sales and conversion techniques · Proactively contacting prospective students to drive interest/applications. · Follow up with students who applied to study at UNIBUZZ partner universities by using a range of technology and social media to contact students, in order to ensure a high standard of post-application support. · Providing input into the marketing strategy and utilising multiple channels to generate new leads. · Reporting sales data, creating reports and dashboards in order to analyse UNIBUZZ recruitment efforts. · Deliver regular reports on targets and compose a forecast for the next quarter. · Analysing feedback provided by students and other stakeholders. · Analysing reports and counselling teams’ performance, finding gaps and resolving issues; facilitate the improvements. · Supporting student conversion, across all markets, through the development and delivery of a range of new and existing initiatives. · Undertaking market research and providing administrative support to ensure optimal engagement with priority areas. · Providing strategic advice and support to the Recru
